import React from 'react' import useState from 'react' export default function App() { const trains=[ {id:'t1',nom:'Buraq',villes:[]}, {id:'t2',nom:'Gazel', villes:[]}, {id:'t3',nom:'Eagle-Wins', villes:[]}, {id:'t4',nom:'Fennec', villes:[]}, ] const [id,setId]=useState() const [train,setTrain]=useState() const [ville,setVille]=useState('') const [message, setMessage]=useState('') function rechercher(){ if(id){ setTrain( trains.find((t)=> t.id==id)) }else{ setMessage('Ce train est inexistant') } } return (

Gestion des trains

Ville Depart 0?train.villes[0]:''} readOnly/>

) }
